content: cuff measures approx 21 cm | 8 25 inch short row heel next we will start shaping our heel using german short row each row we are working 2 sts less than the previous row change to a 80 cm | 32 inch cable work as follows row 1 rs from bor m k16 turn work and make a ds row 2 ws p to bor m slip m p16 turn work and make a ds row 3 k to bor m slip m k14 turn work and make a ds row 4 p to bor m slip m p14 turn work and make a ds row 5 k to bor m slip m k12 turn work and make a ds row 6 p to bor m slip m p12 turn work and make a ds row 7 k to bor m slip m k10 turn work and make a ds row 8 p to bor m slip m p10 turn work and make a ds row 9 k to bor m slip m k8 turn work and make a ds row 10 p to bor m slip m p8 turn work and make a ds we have now decreased for our heel next we will start working towards the original stitch count 32 sts each time working 2 sts past the previous ds work the ds as 1 st continue as follows row 11 rs k to bor m slip m k8 turn work and make a ds row 12 ws p to bor m slip m p8 turn work and make a ds row 13 k to bor m slip m k to the first ds encountered and work it as 1 st k1 work the next ds as 1 st turn work and make a ds row 14 p to bor m slip m to the first ds encountered and work it as 1 st p1 work the next ds as 1 st turn work and make a ds work row 13-14 above until you have worked 16 sts on each side of the bor m ending with a ws row turn work and make a ds work one more row as described below whilst resolving all double sts final row rs k16 slip m row 6 chart a to m slip m k to bor m foot after shaping our heel with german short row we will continue working in the round in established pattern change back to the 40 cm | 16 inch cable start chart a from row 7 work as follows round 1 row 1 chart b to m slip m chart a to m slip m row 1 chart b to bor m round 2 row 2 chart b to m slip m chart a to m slip m row 2 chart b to bor m 5/6 mipi work rounds 3-4 above for a total of 4 repeats of chart a including the repeat where we started from row 7 then work
